akn:section.akn:heading: Improvements; notice; good faith; directions to jury; measure of damages.

akn:content.akn:p: damages of the plaintiff, being the clear value over and above taxes and necessary expenses of the use and occupation of the property, exclusive of the improvements, during the whole period of the occupation of the property to the date of the verdict, and any damage done to the property, by waste or otherwise, by the parties during the occupation;
present value of any permanent improvements that may have been placed on the premises by the defendant or those under whom he claims; and
present value of the property of the plaintiff without and exclusive of the improvements.
